title: MIT Cancels What Most Call Common Sense
sub_head: Prof. Dorian Abbot expresses the opinions of many with a level of confidence that has been missing.
body:
Thank you for publishing Dorian Abbot’s “The Views That Made Me Persona Non Grata at MIT” (op-ed, Oct. 30). It reflects the opinion of so many who have felt their voices suppressed for so long—whether at meetings for the local planning commission, school board, church or soccer-club selection. Mr. Abbot instills a level of confidence sorely missing in our public discourse.
Pete Moegenburg
